Package jcolibri.cbrcase

Interface Summary
CBRCase Interface that will represent any Case structure built to be used on JColibrí
CBRCaseBase This interface defines the methods that at least any Case Base must implement to be transparently used by the methods on the framework
CBRQuery Represents a CBR query over the system
Connector Connector interface declares the methodd needed to be implemented by the classes that will access to the cases from the phisical storage.
Individual Represents the invidual concept.
 

Class Summary
BasicCBRCaseBase BasicCBRCaseBase is a simple linear implementation of the interface CBRCaseBase.
CaseEvalList Data structure containing a set of CaseEvaluation objects, that holds a case and a object that represents an evaluation of the case.
CaseEvaluation Data structure containing a case and a object that represents its evaluation
CBRCaseRecord Simple attribute-value CBRCase strucutre.
CBRGenericQuery Generic query for a CBR Application.
IndividualRelation Represents the relation concept between two individuals
RelationEvaluation Data structure containing a relation and a object that represents its evaluation
SimpleIndividual Basic implemenation of Individual interface
